verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> "Depart, <WH3212> go up <WH5927> from here, <WH5971> you and the people that you have brought up <WH5927> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> to the land <WH776> of which I swore <WH7650> to Abraham, <WH85> to Isaac, <WH3327> and to Jacob, <WH3290> saying, <WH559> <WH5414> 'I will give it to your seed. <WH2233>'

I will send <WH7971> an angel <WH4397> before <WH6440> you; <WH1644> and I will drive out the Canaanite, <WH3669> the Amorite, <WH567> and the Hittite, <WH2850> and the Perizzite, <WH6522> the Hivite, <WH2340> and the Jebusite: <WH2983>

to a land <WH776> flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey: <WH1706> for I will not go up <WH5927> in the midst <WH7130> of you, <WH7186> for you are a stiff-necked people, <WH5971> lest I consume <WH3615> you in the way. <WH1870>"
When the people <WH5971> heard <WH8085> this evil <WH7451> news, <WH1697> they mourned: <WH56> and no one <WH376> put <WH7896> on his jewelry. <WH5716>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "Tell <WH559> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> <WH7186> 'You are a stiff-necked people. <WH5971> If I were to go up <WH5927> into your midst <WH7130> for one <WH259> moment, <WH7281> I would consume <WH3615> you. <WH3381> Therefore now take off your jewelry <WH5716> from you, <WH3045> that I may know what to do to you. <WH6213>'"
The children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> stripped <WH5337> themselves of their jewelry <WH5716> from Mount <WH2022> Horeb onward. <WH2722>

Now Moses <WH4872> used to take <WH3947> the tent <WH168> and to pitch <WH5186> it outside <WH2351> the camp, <WH4264> far away <WH7368> from the camp, <WH4264> and he called <WH7121> it <WH168> "The Tent of Meeting. <WH4150>" It happened that everyone who sought <WH1245> Yahweh <WH3068> went out <WH3318> to the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> which was outside <WH2351> the camp. <WH4264>

It happened that when Moses <WH4872> went out <WH3318> to the Tent, <WH168> that all the people <WH5971> rose up, <WH6965> and stood, <WH5324> everyone <WH376> at their tent <WH168> door, <WH6607> and <WH310> watched <WH5027> Moses, <WH4872> until he had gone <WH935> into the Tent. <WH168>

It happened, <WH4872> when Moses entered <WH935> into the Tent, <WH168> that the pillar <WH5982> of cloud <WH6051> descended, <WH3381> stood <WH5975> at the door <WH6607> of the Tent, <WH168> and spoke <WH1696> with Moses. <WH4872>

All the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> the pillar <WH5982> of cloud <WH6051> stand <WH5975> at the door <WH6607> of the Tent, <WH168> and all the people <WH5971> rose up <WH6965> and worshiped, <WH7812> everyone <WH376> at their tent <WH168> door. <WH6607>

Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> face <WH6440> to face, <WH6440> as a man <WH376> speaks <WH1696> to his friend. <WH7453> He turned again <WH7725> into the camp, <WH4264> but his servant <WH8334> Joshua, <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> a young man, <WH5288> didn't <WH4185> depart out <WH4185> of the Tent. <WH168>

Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to Yahweh, <WH3068> "Behold, <WH7200> you tell <WH559> me, <WH5927> 'Bring up this people: <WH5971>' and you haven't <WH3045> let me know whom you will send <WH7971> with me. <WH559> Yet you have said, <WH3045> 'I know you by name, <WH8034> and you have also found <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in my sight. <WH5869>'

Now therefore, <WH4672> if I have found favor <WH2580> in your sight, <WH5869> please show <WH3045> me now your ways, <WH1870> that I may know <WH3045> you, <WH4672> so that I may find favor <WH2580> in your sight: <WH5869> and consider <WH7200> that this nation <WH1471> is your people. <WH5971>"
He said, <WH559> "My presence <WH6440> will go <WH3212> with you, <WH5117> and I will give you rest."
He said <WH559> to him, <WH6440> "If your presence doesn't <WH1980> go with me, <WH5927> don't carry us up from here.

For how would people know <WH3045> that <WH645> I have found <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in your sight, <WH5869> I and your people? <WH5971> Isn't <WH3212> it in that you go with us, <WH6395> so that we are separated, I and your people, <WH5971> from all the people <WH5971> who are on the surface <WH6440> of the earth? <WH127>"

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> "I will do <WH6213> this thing <WH1697> also that you have spoken; <WH1696> for you have found <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in my sight, <WH5869> and I know <WH3045> you by name. <WH8034>"
He said, <WH559> "Please <WH4994> show <WH7200> me your glory. <WH3519>"

He said, <WH559> "I will make all my goodness <WH2898> pass <WH5674> before you, <WH7121> and will proclaim the name <WH8034> of Yahweh <WH3068> before <WH6440> you. <WH2603> I will be gracious to whom I will be gracious, <WH2603> and will show mercy <WH7355> on whom I will show mercy. <WH7355>"
He said, <WH559> "You cannot <WH3201> see <WH7200> my face, <WH6440> for man <WH120> may not see <WH7200> me and live. <WH2425>"
Yahweh <WH3068> also said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH4725> there is a place by me, <WH5324> and you shall stand on the rock. <WH6697>

It will happen, <WH3519> while my glory passes by, <WH5674> that I will put <WH7760> you in a cleft <WH5366> of the rock, <WH6697> and will cover <WH5526> you with my hand <WH3709> until <WH5704> I have passed by; <WH5674>
then I will take <WH5493> away my hand, <WH3709> and you will see <WH7200> my back; <WH268> but my face <WH6440> shall not be seen. <WH7200>"
